Application Name: ABBA The Museum.
Number of Reviews: 6.00.
Application Description: Coming to ABBA The Museum?Get the full ABBA experience for your visit by downloading our brand-new Pop House app. From audio guides to ABBA-themed selfies, our app helps you to explore more, learn more and experience more.  Learn about the app below, then download to get your ABBA The Museum experience started.  Audio guide: If you are at the museum you can immersing yourself in the world of ABBA. It couldn't be easier with the audio guide feature. Simply enter the code on the exhibition in your app to hear the band bring each exhibition to life with stories and memories from their incredible careers. Information: Keep an eye on upcoming events at Abba The museumRead moreCollapse.
